name: R-ProjectMail
short_description:
RMail is a program that automates the emailing of Sweave reports produced with the R statistical language (r-project.org).  

Features of RMail include:
- multiple email 
- logging of activity and PDF reports
- configuration for daily, weekly, monthly reports
- ability to set time of day for the report to be executed.

Installation of RMail

Download the RMail.exe program and install as normal.
Ensure you have R 2.9.2 or higher
Install the svSweave package
Install rTools.  (http://www.murdoch-sutherland.com/Rtools/)
Install MikTek (www.miktex.org)
Alter system path (PATH=) to include:
c:\program files (x86)\R\R-2.11.1\bin
c:\RTools\bin
c:\MikTeX\miktex\bin
note: when using RMail the style sheet sweave.sty must be in the same directory as the reports rnw file.
summary: RMail automates the emailing of R-Project Sweave reports.
